info.name: WhatsApp API - Smart Kitchen
info.description: Collection for testing WhatsApp Messages API wrapper

request.description:
Send a plain text message via WhatsApp. 

Replace the phoneNumber with your WhatsApp number (with country code, no + sign).

Send a WhatsApp template message.

Template must be pre-approved in your Meta Business Manager.

Common language codes:
- en_US (English - US)
- en_GB (English - UK)
- hi (Hindi)
- es (Spanish)
